item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

sickedank:

wouldn’t it be easier for the npc to just drop the item? ever heard of that?

Usually yes, but I’m adding PC…when you kill the last portal I want it to add tickets to your invy…Ever heard of that?

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

I tried around 3 different ways to make it add an item after you kill an NPC…Is this possible? Would this work:

if(npcs[#].npcType == #) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.sendMessage("blah"); addItem(#,#) }

Read full topic
